price: وە مافی خزمانت بدە (ھەروەھا مافی) ھەژار و ڕێبواریش زیادە ڕەویش مەکەن
arabic: وَءَاتِ ذَا ٱلۡقُرۡبَىٰ حَقَّهُۥ وَٱلۡمِسۡكِينَ وَٱبۡنَ ٱلسَّبِيلِ وَلَا تُبَذِّرۡ تَبۡذِيرًا

version.title: Kurdish Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kurdish by Muhammad Saleh Bamuky. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: waāti dhā al-qur'bā ḥaqqahu wal-mis'kīna wa-ib'na al-sabīli walā tubadhir tabdhīran
